Title: Relates to not-for-profit lease of real property
Summary: Relates to not-for-profit lease of real property; provides that when real property not used exclusively to carry out one or more exempt purposes is leased or otherwise used for commercial for-profit purposes, such property shall be subject to taxation and no portion shall be exempt.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to not-for-profit lease of real property
